fields.label: Coin Size
fields.description: Size of the coin in pixels

fields.label: New Coin Interval
fields.description: Adds a new coin each time this number of seconds goes by. Set to 0 for no new coins

fields.label: Starting coins
fields.description: The number of coins on the screen when the game starts

fields.label: Show Play Again
fields.description: Show the player a "play again" button after the game ends

fields.label: Use sound
fields.description: Play a sound effect when the player collects a coin.
